interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3 Packs Braiding Hair Extensions 165G Jumbo Braiding Hair High Temperature Synthetic Fiber Jumbo Braiding Hair Extensions ( Blue)
Review Date: 2020/09/09
Store: UHair
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'UHair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'}
Review Text: I was a little worried because the packaging was ripped when it came. And this is the packaging that within the Amazon package. Luckily all 3 packs were there. I was also worried because the hair looked really plastic-y .Once I started using it though, it was really easy to work with! I ended up cutting the hair to make shorter box braids though because it was so long. I would recommend ordering 2 to cover your whole head. I needed 6 packs to do a full head of box braids.
Review Title: Great for box braids!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set.
Natwag
{'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'}
This took off layers of foundation and contouring easily, but was soft on the skin while removing them. I like the loops on each pad because I can hook a finger through the loop to keep the pad in place while I wash my face.
Soft on skin, hard on makeup
Biutee Poly Nail Gel Kit 15ml 0.53oz Pink Nail Extension Gel Builder Gel Long Lasting Nail Salon Nail Art Design DIY at Home Beginner Friendly…
Biutee
{'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 2 x 1.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
The polygel is very sticky and hard to smooth out on the mold. I used nail polish remover in between nails to make it a little easier. Once the gel was finally applied, I was impressed, but the nails only lasted two days before falling off during daily activities like washing my hair and doing the dishes. And that was after I put dip powder on top of the polygel for color. Also note that this is only the gel, you have to order a mold separately to help put them on.
Not long lasting
3 Packs Braiding Hair Extensions 165G Jumbo Braiding Hair High Temperature Synthetic Fiber Jumbo Braiding Hair Extensions ( Blue)
UHair
{'Brand': 'UHair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'}
I was a little worried because the packaging was ripped when it came. And this is the packaging that within the Amazon package. Luckily all 3 packs were there. I was also worried because the hair looked really plastic-y .Once I started using it though, it was really easy to work with! I ended up cutting the hair to make shorter box braids though because it was so long. I would recommend ordering 2 to cover your whole head. I needed 6 packs to do a full head of box braids.
Great for box braids!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor reusable and environmentally friendly options in beauty care, now extending this preference towards hair products, as evidenced by their recent purchase of synthetic hair extensions.
  
- **Skin Sensitivity:** Maintains a preference for gentle products suitable for all skin types, particularly accommodating dry skin, although recent hair product interactions suggest flexibility in material types as the focus is on usability rather than direct skin contact.
  
- **Functionality:** Values practicality and effectiveness, particularly in applications such as makeup removal and hairstyling. They have experienced varied performance with nail products and may now also explore the functionality of hair extensions regarding ease of use and styling adaptability.
  
- **Design Features:** Appreciates thoughtful design and usability in all products. Their recent experience with the hair extensions highlighted concerns about initial packaging but ultimately resulted in satisfaction with usability, indicating a balance of design and function is essential.
  
- **Overall Satisfaction:** While generally satisfied with product experiences, the user noted some concerns regarding product durability and initial presentation, emphasizing their preference for effective and reliable outcomes.
  
- **Review Style:** Focuses on product effectiveness and user experience, critically assessing usability and comfort, whether in beauty care or hairstyling applications, reflecting a comprehensive approach to evaluating product performance.
